server.name: io.qlik.internal/qlik-design-system
server.description: Qlik Design System MCP Server v0.1.0 - Query Sprout design tokens, guidelines, and components for design-consistent code generation.

io.modelcontextprotocol.registry/officia.useCase: Enables Copilot to query Qlik Sprout design tokens, guidelines, and components for design-consistent code generation
io.modelcontextprotocol.registry/officia.dependencies: Python 3.12+, FastMCP, local design system files
io.modelcontextprotocol.registry/officia.dataAccess: Local design tokens (CSV) and guidelines (MDX) - no PII or external services
